aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Files

  • Object
    • Files

  • public class Files
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of Console commands converning saving, loading and browsing for certain files.
    Local Call
    Files commands are all local.
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
